verses.verse: Let a man <S%G444><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> account <S%G3049><s%> of us, as of the ministers <S%G5257><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and stewards <S%G3623><s%> of the mysteries <S%G3466><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
Moreover <S%G3739><s%> it is required <S%G2212><s%> in stewards, <S%G3623><s%> that a man <S%G5100><s%> be found <S%G2147><s%> faithful. <S%G4103><s%>

But with me it is a very <S%G1646><s%> small <S%G1646><s%> thing that I should be judged <S%G350><s%> of you, or <S%G2228><s%> of man's <S%G442><s%> judgment: <S%G2250><s%> yes, <S%G235><s%> I judge <S%G350><s%> not my <S%G1683><s%> own <S%G1683><s%> self. <S%G1683><s%>

For I know <S%G1492><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> by myself; <S%G1683><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> am I not hereby <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5129><s%> justified: <S%G1344><s%> but he that judges <S%G350><s%> me is the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Therefore <S%G5620><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> nothing <S%G3385><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the time, <S%G2540><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> come, <S%G2064><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> will bring <S%G5461><s%> to light <S%G5461><s%> the hidden <S%G2927><s%> things of darkness, <S%G4655><s%> and will make <S%G5319><s%> manifest <S%G5319><s%> the counsels <S%G1012><s%> of the hearts: <S%G2588><s%> and then <S%G5119><s%> shall every <S%G1538><s%> man have <S%G1096><s%> praise <S%G1868><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And these <S%G5023><s%> things, brothers, <S%G80><s%> I have in a figure <S%G3345><s%> transferred <S%G3345><s%> to myself <S%G1683><s%> and to Apollos <S%G625><s%> for your <S%G5209><s%> sakes; that you might learn <S%G3129><s%> in us not to think <S%G5426><s%> of men above <S%G5228><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> is written, <S%G1125><s%> that no <S%G3361><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of you be puffed <S%G5448><s%> up for one <S%G1520><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> another. <S%G2087><s%>

For who <S%G5101><s%> makes <S%G1252><s%> you to differ <S%G1252><s%> from another? and what <S%G5101><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> you that you did not receive? <S%G2983><s%> now <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1499><s%> you did receive <S%G2983><s%> it, why <S%G5101><s%> do you glory, <S%G2744><s%> as if you had not received <S%G2983><s%> it?

Now <S%G2236><s%> you are full, <S%G2880><s%> now <S%G2236><s%> you are rich, <S%G4147><s%> you have reigned <S%G936><s%> as kings without <S%G5565><s%> us: and I would <S%G3785><s%> to God you did reign, <S%G936><s%> that we also <S%G2532><s%> might reign <S%G4821><s%> with you.

For I think <S%G1380><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> has set <S%G584><s%> forth <S%G584><s%> us the apostles <S%G652><s%> last, <S%G2078><s%> as it were appointed <S%G1935><s%> to death: <S%G1935><s%> for we are made <S%G1096><s%> a spectacle <S%G2302><s%> to the world, <S%G2889><s%> and to angels, <S%G32><s%> and to men. <S%G444><s%>

We are fools <S%G3474><s%> for Christ's <S%G5547><s%> sake, but you are wise <S%G5429><s%> in Christ; <S%G5547><s%> we are weak, <S%G772><s%> but you are strong; <S%G2478><s%> you are honorable, <S%G1741><s%> but we are despised. <S%G820><s%>

Even to this <S%G3588><s%> present <S%G737><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> we both <S%G2532><s%> hunger, <S%G3983><s%> and thirst, <S%G1372><s%> and are naked, <S%G1130><s%> and are buffeted, <S%G2852><s%> and have no <S%G790><s%> certain <S%G790><s%> dwelling place; <S%G790><s%>

And labor, <S%G2872><s%> working <S%G2038><s%> with our own <S%G2398><s%> hands: <S%G5495><s%> being reviled, <S%G3058><s%> we bless; <S%G2127><s%> being persecuted, <S%G1377><s%> we suffer <S%G430><s%> it:

Being defamed, <S%G987><s%> we entreat: <S%G3870><s%> we are made <S%G1096><s%> as the filth <S%G4027><s%> of the world, <S%G2889><s%> and are the offscouring <S%G4067><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> things to this <S%G737><s%> day. <S%G737><s%>
I write <S%G1125><s%> not these <S%G5023><s%> things to shame <S%G1788><s%> you, but as my beloved <S%G27><s%> sons <S%G5043><s%> I warn <S%G3560><s%> you.

For though <S%G1437><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> ten <S%G3463><s%> thousand <S%G3563><s%> instructors <S%G3807><s%> in Christ, <S%G5547><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> have you not many <S%G4183><s%> fathers: <S%G3962><s%> for in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> I have begotten <S%G1080><s%> you through <S%G1223><s%> the gospel. <S%G2098><s%>
Why <S%G3767><s%> I beseech <S%G3870><s%> you, be you followers <S%G3402><s%> of me.

For this <S%G5124><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%> have I sent to you Timotheus, <S%G5095><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is my beloved <S%G27><s%> son, <S%G5043><s%> and faithful <S%G4103><s%> in the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> shall bring <S%G363><s%> you into remembrance <S%G363><s%> of my ways <S%G3598><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> be in Christ, <S%G5547><s%> as I teach <S%G1321><s%> every <S%G3837><s%> where <S%G3837><s%> in every <S%G3956><s%> church. <S%G1577><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> are puffed <S%G5448><s%> up, as though I would not come <S%G2064><s%> to you.

But I will come <S%G2064><s%> to you shortly, <S%G5030><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> will, <S%G2309><s%> and will know, <S%G1097><s%> not the speech <S%G3056><s%> of them which are puffed <S%G5448><s%> up, but the power. <S%G1411><s%>
For the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is not in word, <S%G3056><s%> but in power. <S%G1411><s%>
What <S%G5101><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> you? shall I come <S%G2064><s%> to you with a rod, <S%G4464><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> in love, <S%G26><s%> and in the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of meekness? <S%G4236><s%>
